title: Egg Quest
description:
"E g g  Q u e s t"


  "A brave egg-splorer goes on an adventure to find a mystical                             ancient relic with his furry companion."

          -Difficulty Rating: Kinda Easy

          -All 21 levels are possible.

     - My best time is 410 seconds, can you beat it?

         - Trending "March 29th 2018"
     -What the community is loving! "March 30th 2018"

           "I n s t r u c t i o n s"

           -Movement: Arrow Keys;
              -Jump: Up Arrow;
            -Pick up bombs: Down + "Z"
             -Jump off bunny: "X"
             -Read Signs: "Z"
             -Retry Level: "R"
 -To activate Speed-Run mode, type "S-P-E-E-D" at the main menu.

               "C r e d i t s"

        Art: @-RipeMangoes- @PokeNinjaGuy
         Music: Fez, Spelunky Classic
            ( V links below V)
        SFX: Bfxr.net, CSGO, YouTube, Fez, Me
          Scripting: @-RipeMangoes- 
       Platform Engine: @Oromi - @-RipeMangoes-
 Text/ Score system: @KevinMacdonald - @RememberNovember
     Egg Designs: @PokeNinjaGuy - @-RipeMangoes-

               100% Ripe

          Thank you for playing my game! ◔◡◔
 If you like this and want to see more from me please Love, Favorite, and consider following me to be updated on my latest projects. Bye              Bye~ (っ◔◡◔)っ

title: Easter Egg Decorator
description:
♥Happy Easter Everybody♥
           ~Feel free to comment with suggestions on what to add~

                                 ♥Featured ~ 30 Mar 2015♥
                          ♥What the Community is Remixing♥

                                             ~Glitches~
♥Sometimes there is a glitch where you cannot touch and move decorations after you move off of the page you got it from...
         ~ I am going to try and fix it, but for now all you have to do is go back to the page you got your decoration from to move it back on to your egg...
instructions:
♥Click and drag decorations onto the egg
♥There are multiples of some smaller decorations
♥Click the decorations to change their color
     ~Some don't change color
♥To change the egg color click the colored circles
     ~The eraser erases the color not the decorations
♥There are only 8 pages of decorations right now
♥Click the Background to change the color
                                           ♦New♦
♥Press space for Baskets

♪Music: 
    Pretty Patrick Lunchtime from Bee and Puppycat 
    By: Baths

     ~Feel free to comment with suggestions on what to add!  :)

title: Google Chrome Dino Run
description:
All credit goes to Google for Chrome logo, gameplay, sprites, and sound effects. No copyright infringement intended.

TOP-LOVED 11/30/17!
TOP-REMIXED 12/6/17!

==========FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS==========
Q: Why does the game start at night?
A: In my remake of the game, the initial time of day depends on the current time on your device. If the time on your device is between 6AM and 5:59 PM, it starts at day; otherwise, it starts at night.

Q: Why does the dinosaur always jump at full height?
A: Unfortunately, I don’t know how to get the dinosaur to jump at lower heights depending on how long the jump button was held down. But nonetheless, I think the game is OK without this implemented. At least you can fall faster with the down arrow key.

Q: How do I get the game to start?
A: You start by pressing either the spacebar or the up arrow key.

Q: How did you make all this?!
A: I've played the original version before, and I used what I remembered from that (and some coding skill) to make all this.
instructions:
Have you ever had a time where you have lost internet connection or had no connection at all while using Google Chrome? You have probably seen (and played) this game on the page saying that there is no internet connection. Well, now you can play it WITH an internet connection right here!

This project is a remake of the game I had mentioned above. And guys, I know that you can turn off the internet connection, play it on other websites such as chrome://dino, etc. to play the actual game. I have turned off commenting for this project because of that. I made this project to show you all my code, as well as to include a world best.

===================CONTROLS===================
Press up or space to start the game. Use the same keys to jump while playing. While jumping, you can press the down arrow key to fall faster. This'll be helpful when the game gets very fast. While on the ground, you can use the same key to crouch. Avoid the cacti and the birds! When you get hit, you can restart the game by clicking the game area.

Go for the highscore! Think you can you beat my record of 2386? I've made the score faster by popular request.

title: Easter Egg Hunt
description:
Thanks to the Easter Bunny for signing the contract to feature a look-a-like is this project
Thanks to the you for clicking on this Scratch
Thanks to those who 'love' this project
Thanks to those who favourite this project
The most thanks to those whoever follow me!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Credit to Google images for the bunny, some of the eggs and the circus tent. ;) Oh, and the picnic basket was off amazon (I needed a photo of open and shut)
instructions:
Follow the Easter Bunny's instruction.
When he says to shut your eyes you don't have to, the screen goes black.
When you spot an egg, click it. There are 10 eggs. Comment your time below! This is aimed at children, so he talks quite slow.
100% made by me, no help!! :) Don't remix without giving credit please :)
FEATURED!!!! Easter Sunday, 2014
Scroll down for egg answers.







Hahaha! Could you not find one? Don't worry :)
In the bunny's hand.
By the bunny's foot.
Click on the picnic basket - there's one inside.
A blue one behind the cloud.
Four behind different Tufts of grass.
One inside the circus tent.
One at the top of the big top :)

title: Scratch Egg Hunt 2016 [GAME] V_1.1.5
description:
Thanks to LawnReality for letting me use his wonderful music in this game! Please support and subscribe to him on his YouTube channel and check out his other amazing compositions at:

https://www.youtube.com/user/LawnReality/videos

UPDATE LOG [V_1.1.5]
> Added 2017 Game Notification
--- Older
>Fixed bug with Dogegg being caught 
> Made Eggo's messages stay on the screen until they are completed (users getting confused)
> Eggo Glitch Fixes
> Eggo Improved!
> Players Encouraged to view help Menu.
> 3 More Glitches Fixed
> Eggo added
> You can now move using W, A, S, and D, or Arrow keys
> 2 Codes have been added.
> Some Glitches Fixed
> 2 Debug commands removed.
instructions:
[=====[SCROLL DOWN]=====]
> Full Instructions can be found under the Help button in the Menu <
> Full Song List can be found under the Info button in the Menu <

Scratch Egg Hunt 2017 is out now for bug testing on my profile!

[FEATURED]: Featured! Wow! Thanks guys! I really appreciate all the supportive comments and I feel bad I didn't check back on the game in a long while. But really, thank you to everyone who Favorited, Loved, and / or left a comment. It really means a lot! As a thanks open the Code Menu by pressing the Spacebar and C and type "moneymoney" for 15 gold and "speedboost" for a faster rabbit.

[NOTE]: THE FINAL AREA IS NOT, NOR EVER WILL BE FULLY COMPLETE. Sorry for any inconveniences caused by this and sorry if I can't respond to your comment, but thank you for playing! I really appreciate it! I wanted to release this game on time, but so many things got in the way.

title: Shave the Egg
description:
Drawn/programmed by me
Sounds were recorded by me
instructions: Hold down the mouse to shave off his eyebrows, beard and hair.

title: Egg-a-thon - 100% Pen Animation
description:
"Chariots of Fire" (Vangelis) was obligatory for this piece! Thanks to @Griffpatch and his Pen Marathon for inspiration.

IT'S FEATURED! Over 1500 loves and 1000 Favourites at the last count! Bless you all, you amazing Scratchers - you rock! I can't reply to all the comments I'm afraid. The eggs are fast, I'm not...
instructions:
Oh no! The chicken farm gate was left open... and all the eggs have bolted!!!

Just sit back and watch as they hurtle across in slo-mo.

More eggs? Try https://scratch.mit.edu/studios/1954306/

title: Cloud Egg ☁
description:
Based on my mmo engine:
http://scratch.mit.edu/projects/22354919/

Basic Cloud Tutorial:
http://scratch.mit.edu/projects/22010269/

My Game Studio:
http://scratch.mit.edu/studios/423983/
instructions:
NOTICE: CLOUD SAVING DOES NOT WORK ANYMORE SINCE CLOUD DATA WAS LIMITED TO 128 CHARACTERS ONLY!
[You are playing my old save when you start the project]

1) Click the egg for more clicks.
2) Buy new upgrades in the shop.
*Press M to mute.

*Testing my mmo engine with a cookie clicker based game!
*Click the egg then move your mouse away from it to save your clicks and refresh the global clicks and the player list!

TIPS:
First buy few autoclickers.
Then keep upgrading your wepon and buying breakers.
Then upgrade your luck to 10, and you will get the jackpot every 100 clicks! (jackpot = 1/10 of your egg max hp)

title: Egg Clicker
instructions:
Click the egg! 
Use the button on the top left to see the store.
Really simple game, I just wanted to try to have nice graphics on a project.

title: ☁ Easter Egg Hunt
description:
Thanks to rex554 for the Cloud list and I edited it a little bit.
Music by Kevin Macleod
instructions:
Welcome to the Easter Egg Hunt! In this game you are creating a Egg hunt for everyone else to see, or you can find some of the already hidden eggs! You hide them with the button in the top right!

Press L to see the log.

REMEMBER TO HIDE EGGS SO THAT OTHER PEOPLE CAN SEE THEM! :-)

title: Egg 2
description:
To everyone: I'm tired of people lying about thier scores, the highest you can get is 2,000! Don't lie.
 
Add me to your list of friends tobe notified for new releases, from new Egg games (such as the one just released: Egg - Wild Hatched) to Ropes of Scratch projects (tutorials) to just new original games (Jump!)

Extra Egg game (Beta) http://scratch.mit.edu/projects/chanmanpartyman/2307863

Curated Feb. 1, 2012! Thanks so much wolvesstar97!!! 


The sequel to my biggest hit, Egg!

Instructions: Arrow keys to move, try to reach the green blocks (goal).

Blocks: Blue blocks: bounce/wall climb, red blocks: bad, grey blocks: basic, purple blocks: jump boost.

Press space to skip levels, but you will lose 20 points in your score outcome.

Skip levels with space, though it will deal you a loss of points.

Post your high scores in your comments!

right arrow-right

title: Easter Egg Hunt!
description:
This is a game where you need to find ten easter eggs and then afterwards, you get to see whats inside! Other inscrutctions are in-game.

Awesome! Featured with over 1,000 views! (Easter 2010)

PLEASE DO NOT REMIX WITHOUT CREDIT. THANK YOU FOR YOUR HONESTY. :)

You have to download it now to find all of the eggs...I think some of them do not work online. Java player works the best for this game besides downloading, just so you know.

title: Easter Egg Hunt
description:
This is a fun little project I made for Easter! Even if you don't celebrate Easter, I hope you can have some fun with this game. :D

All art and coding by me!
I got all of the sound effects from the Scratch sound library.
I used @ipzy's scrolling tutorial for help with the scrolling.
instructions:
Use the arrow keys to move around. Click once on things to look under them. *You can click on anything that moves when you touch it. Click on the inventory to see the things you have and haven't found yet. The grey shapes in the inventory are things you haven't found, and they fill in once you've discovered them.
-There are some things that are not in the inventory (like animals).

Things to collect:
4 Easter eggs
3 chocolate bunnies
Jelly beans

Things to see:
Duck
Rabbit
Spider
Bird
